properties.data_flow: Token request/response
properties.rationale: Customer Portal authenticates users via Keystone token-based auth
properties.assumption: Standard OpenStack Keystone auth pattern

properties.data_flow: Navigation/redirect and session handoff
properties.rationale: Customer Portal (Fabric) routes cloud product users to Cloud Control Panel
properties.assumption: Portal is primary entry point that hands off to CCP

properties.data_flow: Transactional emails (password reset, notifications) dispatched via Mailgun
properties.rationale: Customer Portal sends transactional emails via Mailgun
properties.assumption: Portal uses Mailgun as email delivery backend

properties.data_flow: Ticket status/updates surfaced in Customer Portal UI
properties.rationale: Rackspace Core Ticketing System exposes ticket data to Customer Portal for customer visibility
properties.assumption: Portal consumes ticket data from CTAPI backend

properties.data_flow: Invoice and billing data surfaced in Customer Portal
properties.rationale: Billing & Revenue Management System supplies invoice/usage data to Customer Portal for customer visibility
properties.assumption: Portal consumes billing data from BRM backend

properties.integration_name: Cloud Feeds: Nova Publisher to Portal
properties.data_flow: Nova CADF usage/event atoms published to Cloud Feeds, consumed by Portal
properties.rationale: Cloud Servers publishes usage events via Cloud Feeds (Atom/CADF) consumed by Customer Portal
properties.assumption: Portal consumes Cloud Feeds events for usage/activity display

properties.data_flow: CRM customer account data surfaced in Customer Portal for account management
properties.rationale: Salesforce CRM account data feeds into Customer Portal for customer-facing account management features
properties.assumption: Customer Portal integrates with CRM for account data display

properties.data_flow: Token request/response, service catalog
properties.rationale: Cloud Control Panel authenticates users via Keystone; primary auth pathway for all cloud operations
properties.assumption: Standard OpenStack Keystone auth pattern

properties.data_flow: REST API calls for server lifecycle management
properties.rationale: Cloud Control Panel orchestrates Nova API for server provisioning/management
properties.assumption: CCP is primary orchestration frontend for Nova

properties.data_flow: REST API calls for network/security group management
properties.rationale: Cloud Control Panel orchestrates Neutron API for network management
properties.assumption: CCP is primary orchestration frontend for Neutron

properties.data_flow: REST API calls for object storage management
properties.rationale: Cloud Control Panel orchestrates Swift API for file/container management
properties.assumption: CCP is primary orchestration frontend for Swift

properties.data_flow: CCP UI calls CCP backend (stabletransit.com) APIs for all cloud operations
properties.rationale: Cloud Control Panel frontend calls its own backend service layer on stabletransit.com
properties.assumption: CCP has a separate frontend/backend architecture

properties.data_flow: REST API calls for DNS zone/record management
properties.rationale: Cloud Control Panel orchestrates DNS API
properties.assumption: CCP is primary orchestration frontend for Cloud DNS

properties.data_flow: REST API calls for database instance management
properties.rationale: Cloud Control Panel orchestrates Cloud Databases API
properties.assumption: CCP is primary orchestration frontend for Cloud Databases

properties.data_flow: REST API calls for LB management
properties.rationale: Cloud Control Panel orchestrates Cloud Load Balancers API
properties.assumption: CCP is primary orchestration frontend for CLB

properties.data_flow: REST API calls for monitoring entity management
properties.rationale: Cloud Control Panel orchestrates Monitoring API for check/entity management
properties.assumption: CCP is primary orchestration frontend for Cloud Monitoring

properties.data_flow: CCP manages Auto Scale groups and policies via Auto Scale API
properties.rationale: Cloud Control Panel orchestrates Rackspace Auto Scale for group and policy management
properties.assumption: CCP is the primary UI for Auto Scale configuration

properties.data_flow: CCP manages Cloud Backup agents and schedules via Backup API
properties.rationale: Cloud Control Panel orchestrates Cloud Backup for backup agent configuration and scheduling
properties.assumption: CCP is the primary UI for Cloud Backup configuration

properties.integration_name: Identity Auth: Cloud Office Control Panel
properties.data_flow: Token request/response
properties.rationale: Cloud Office Control Panel authenticates via Keystone
properties.assumption: Standard OpenStack Keystone auth pattern

properties.integration_name: Cloud Office Control Panel to Email Hosting
properties.data_flow: Control panel manages mailboxes and email settings on email hosting platform
properties.rationale: Cloud Office Control Panel is the admin interface for the email hosting platform
properties.assumption: Control panel directly provisions/manages email hosting backend

properties.integration_name: Cloud Office Control Panel to Email Admin API
properties.data_flow: Control panel calls Email Admin API for mailbox provisioning operations
properties.rationale: Cloud Office Control Panel uses Email Admin API as its backend for programmatic email management
properties.assumption: Control panel fronts the Email Admin API

properties.data_flow: Token request/response
properties.rationale: Cloud Office Webmail authenticates via Keystone
properties.assumption: Standard OpenStack Keystone auth pattern

properties.integration_name: Cloud Office Webmail to Email Hosting
properties.data_flow: Webmail client reads/sends email from email hosting platform
properties.rationale: Cloud Office Webmail Portal is the end-user interface to the email hosting platform
properties.assumption: Webmail connects directly to email hosting backend via IMAP/SMTP

properties.data_flow: Token validation, service catalog
properties.rationale: Nova validates every API call via Keystone token
properties.assumption: Standard OpenStack auth middleware (keystonemiddleware)

properties.data_flow: Token validation, service catalog
properties.rationale: Swift validates every API call via Keystone token
properties.assumption: Standard OpenStack auth middleware (keystonemiddleware)

properties.data_flow: Token validation, service catalog
properties.rationale: Cloud DNS API validates tokens via Keystone
properties.assumption: Standard OpenStack auth middleware

properties.data_flow: Token validation, service catalog
properties.rationale: Cloud Databases API validates tokens via Keystone
properties.assumption: Standard OpenStack auth middleware

properties.data_flow: Token validation, service catalog
properties.rationale: Cloud Load Balancers API validates tokens via Keystone
properties.assumption: Standard OpenStack auth middleware

properties.data_flow: Token validation, service catalog
properties.rationale: Cloud Networking API validates tokens via Keystone
properties.assumption: Standard OpenStack auth middleware

properties.data_flow: Token validation, service catalog
properties.rationale: Monitoring API validates tokens via Keystone
properties.assumption: Standard OpenStack auth middleware

properties.data_flow: Token validation
properties.rationale: Mailgun auth via Keystone for Rackspace-integrated email delivery
properties.assumption: Rackspace-owned Mailgun uses Keystone for internal service auth

properties.data_flow: Token validation
properties.rationale: ObjectRocket DBaaS auth via Keystone for Rackspace-integrated service
properties.assumption: ObjectRocket uses Keystone for internal auth integration

properties.data_flow: SSO/token federation
properties.rationale: ServiceNow ITSM federated auth via Keystone/SAML for Rackspace employee SSO
properties.assumption: ServiceNow uses Keystone-backed SSO for Rackspace employees

properties.data_flow: Keystone auth logs forwarded to Splunk for security analysis
properties.rationale: Splunk SIEM ingests Keystone auth/access logs for threat detection; identity events are high-value security signals
properties.assumption: Keystone logs forwarded to Splunk via forwarder

properties.data_flow: AD identity federation to Keystone via SAML/LDAP for employee SSO
properties.rationale: Active Directory 3-Forest architecture federates employee identities to Keystone for cloud platform access
properties.assumption: Keystone SAML federation (keystone-rxt) bridges AD and cloud auth

properties.data_flow: CCP backend authenticates API calls via Keystone token validation
properties.rationale: CCP backend (stabletransit.com) validates all user tokens against Keystone
properties.assumption: CCP backend is a Keystone-authenticated service layer

properties.data_flow: Cloud Backup agent authenticates via Keystone token
properties.rationale: Cloud Backup v1 and v2 authenticate via Keystone (confirmed from int-0017/int-0018 neighbor lookup)
properties.assumption: Standard Keystone auth for Rackspace Cloud services

properties.data_flow: Auto Scale authenticates via Keystone token
properties.rationale: Rackspace Auto Scale authenticates via Keystone (confirmed from int-0024 neighbor lookup)
properties.assumption: Standard Keystone auth for Rackspace Cloud services

properties.integration_name: Rackspace Managed Cloud to Keystone Auth
properties.data_flow: RMC platform authenticates all API operations via Keystone
properties.rationale: Rackspace Managed Cloud Platform validates tokens and authorizes operations via Keystone
properties.assumption: RMC uses Keystone for authentication like all Rackspace cloud services

properties.data_flow: Nova calls Neutron to provision virtual networks/ports on server create
properties.rationale: Nova delegates network provisioning to Neutron for every VM lifecycle event
properties.assumption: Standard OpenStack Nova-Neutron integration via neutron-client

properties.data_flow: Automation toolbox provisions/configures Cloud Servers via Nova API
properties.rationale: Infrastructure Automation Toolbox calls Nova API for server provisioning in automation workflows
properties.assumption: Automation toolbox is the primary infra-as-code interface to Nova

properties.integration_name: Billing to Cloud Servers Usage Metering
properties.data_flow: Nova usage/metering data consumed by Billing for invoice generation
properties.rationale: Billing system ingests Nova compute usage data for customer billing
properties.assumption: Nova emits usage events consumed by BRM via Cloud Feeds or direct API

properties.integration_name: Splunk SIEM: Cloud Servers Log Ingestion
properties.data_flow: Nova/compute logs forwarded to Splunk for security analysis
properties.rationale: Splunk SIEM ingests Cloud Servers logs for threat detection and compliance
properties.assumption: Nova logs are forwarded to Splunk via log forwarder/agent

properties.integration_name: Trend Micro Workload Security to Cloud Servers
properties.data_flow: Trend Micro agent deployed on Cloud Server instances for workload protection
properties.rationale: Trend Micro Cloud One Workload Security protects Cloud Server (Nova) instances via agent deployment
properties.assumption: Trend Micro agents deployed on Nova VMs report to Trend Micro management plane

properties.data_flow: Auto Scale calls Nova API to provision/delete server instances during scale events
properties.rationale: Rackspace Auto Scale directly calls Nova to add/remove Cloud Server instances based on scaling policies
properties.assumption: Auto Scale is an orchestration layer over Nova

properties.data_flow: RMC platform provisions and manages Cloud Server instances via Nova API
properties.rationale: Rackspace Managed Cloud Platform orchestrates Nova for managed customer cloud infrastructure
properties.assumption: RMC is the managed services orchestration layer over Nova and other cloud APIs

properties.data_flow: Auth token exchange for storage access
properties.rationale: Cloud Files uses dedicated auth service for storage endpoint authentication
properties.assumption: Swift uses a dedicated auth service separate from main Keystone

properties.data_flow: Swift objects served via CDN edge
properties.rationale: Cloud Files (Swift) integrates with CDN edge network for object delivery
properties.assumption: Standard Rackspace Swift-CDN integration (Akamai)

properties.data_flow: Swift storage metrics reported to Monitoring API
properties.rationale: Cloud Files (Swift) integrates with Cloud Monitoring for storage health/metrics reporting
properties.assumption: Swift reports health metrics to Monitoring API

properties.integration_name: Rubrik Cyber Recovery to Cloud Files
properties.data_flow: Rubrik backup data stored in Cloud Files (Swift) as backup target
properties.rationale: Rubrik Cyber Recovery Cloud uses Cloud Files object storage as backup/archive target
properties.assumption: Rubrik uses Swift-compatible object storage for offsite backup

properties.integration_name: Cloud Backup to Cloud Files Storage
properties.data_flow: Cloud Backup (DriveClient) stores backup data in Cloud Files (Swift)
properties.rationale: Rackspace Cloud Backup uses Cloud Files as the backup storage backend
properties.assumption: Standard Cloud Backup architecture uses Swift for encrypted backup storage

properties.integration_name: Cloud DNS to Authoritative DNS Cluster
properties.data_flow: Zone/record updates pushed to authoritative DNS servers
properties.rationale: Cloud DNS API propagates zone changes to authoritative DNS cluster
properties.assumption: Standard DNS API to authoritative cluster architecture

properties.data_flow: DNS queries resolved via Cloud DNS resolver infrastructure
properties.rationale: Cloud DNS API works with resolver cluster for query resolution
properties.assumption: DNS API integrates with resolver infrastructure

properties.data_flow: Monitoring alert notifications dispatched via Mailgun email delivery
properties.rationale: Rackspace Monitoring sends email alerts via Mailgun transactional email platform
properties.assumption: Monitoring API uses Mailgun as email notification backend

properties.data_flow: Monitoring API pushes check configurations to agent fleet
properties.rationale: Rackspace Monitoring API sends check definitions and configuration updates to the agent fleet
properties.assumption: Monitoring API is the control plane for agent fleet configuration

properties.data_flow: Agent executes checks and reports metrics to Monitoring API
properties.rationale: Monitoring Agent Fleet reports check results to the Monitoring API (polling/push)
properties.assumption: Standard Rackspace Cloud Monitoring agent-to-API reporting

properties.data_flow: Corporate website contact/lead forms deliver email via Mailgun
properties.rationale: Rackspace Corporate Website uses Mailgun for transactional/marketing email delivery from web forms
properties.assumption: AWS-hosted corporate site uses Mailgun as email delivery backend

properties.data_flow: Salesforce CRM sends customer communications via Mailgun
properties.rationale: Salesforce CRM uses Mailgun for outbound customer email communications
properties.assumption: CRM uses Mailgun as the email delivery integration for customer outreach

properties.data_flow: ObjectRocket connection strings resolved via self-hosted DNS
properties.rationale: ObjectRocket DBaaS platform uses its self-hosted DNS for service discovery and connection routing
properties.assumption: ObjectRocket maintains its own DNS infrastructure for database endpoint resolution

properties.data_flow: ObjectRocket platform manages Elasticsearch clusters as a DBaaS offering
properties.rationale: ObjectRocket DBaaS Platform provisions and manages Elasticsearch clusters
properties.assumption: ObjectRocket Elasticsearch is a sub-service of the ObjectRocket DBaaS platform

properties.integration_name: BGP Peering: AS12200 to DFW Edge
properties.data_flow: BGP route advertisements and updates
properties.rationale: Core AS12200 BGP cluster peers with regional DFW edge router
properties.assumption: Standard iBGP/eBGP peering between core and regional routers

properties.integration_name: BGP Peering: AS12200 to IAD Edge
properties.data_flow: BGP route advertisements and updates
properties.rationale: Core AS12200 BGP cluster peers with regional IAD edge router
properties.assumption: Standard iBGP/eBGP peering between core and regional routers

properties.integration_name: BGP Peering: AS12200 to ORD Edge
properties.data_flow: BGP route advertisements and updates
properties.rationale: Core AS12200 BGP cluster peers with regional ORD edge router
properties.assumption: Standard iBGP/eBGP peering between core and regional routers

properties.integration_name: BGP Peering: AS12200 to LON Edge
properties.data_flow: BGP route advertisements and updates
properties.rationale: Core AS12200 BGP cluster peers with regional LON edge router
properties.assumption: Standard iBGP/eBGP peering between core and regional routers

properties.integration_name: BGP Peering: AS12200 to Megaport Exchange
properties.data_flow: BGP route exchange for RackConnect hybrid connectivity
properties.rationale: AS12200 BGP core peers with Megaport exchange gateways for RackConnect
properties.assumption: RackConnect uses Megaport as exchange fabric for BGP peering

properties.integration_name: BGP Peering: AS12200 to Equinix Exchange
properties.data_flow: BGP route exchange for RackConnect hybrid connectivity
properties.rationale: AS12200 BGP core peers with Equinix exchange gateways for RackConnect
properties.assumption: RackConnect uses Equinix as exchange fabric for BGP peering

properties.data_flow: DDoS mitigation cluster signals BGP blackhole/scrubbing routes to edge routers
properties.rationale: DDoS mitigation cluster (Arbor/Cisco Guard) communicates with BGP edge to inject scrubbing or blackhole routes during attacks
properties.assumption: Standard DDoS BGP mitigation architecture

properties.data_flow: Network monitoring polls BGP edge routers for interface/traffic metrics
properties.rationale: Network Monitoring Cluster (RackWatch/MRTG) collects SNMP/flow data from BGP edge routers
properties.assumption: Standard SNMP/flow-based network monitoring for edge infrastructure

properties.integration_name: DFW BGP Edge to Site Firewall
properties.data_flow: BGP edge routes traffic through site firewall for inspection
properties.rationale: Regional DFW BGP edge router routes inbound/outbound traffic through site firewall clusters
properties.assumption: Standard edge-to-firewall traffic path in Rackspace datacenters

properties.integration_name: IAD BGP Edge to Site Firewall
properties.data_flow: BGP edge routes traffic through site firewall for inspection
properties.rationale: Regional IAD BGP edge router routes inbound/outbound traffic through site firewall clusters
properties.assumption: Standard edge-to-firewall traffic path in Rackspace datacenters

properties.integration_name: ORD BGP Edge to Site Firewall
properties.data_flow: BGP edge routes traffic through site firewall for inspection
properties.rationale: Regional ORD BGP edge router routes inbound/outbound traffic through site firewall clusters
properties.assumption: Standard edge-to-firewall traffic path in Rackspace datacenters

properties.integration_name: LON BGP Edge to Site Firewall
properties.data_flow: BGP edge routes traffic through site firewall for inspection
properties.rationale: Regional LON BGP edge router routes inbound/outbound traffic through site firewall clusters
properties.assumption: Standard edge-to-firewall traffic path in Rackspace datacenters

properties.integration_name: Email Hosting to Cloud Office DNS
properties.data_flow: Email hosting platform uses Cloud Office DNS for MX and service record resolution
properties.rationale: Email hosting platform (emailsrvr.com) relies on Cloud Office DNS (name-services.com) for mail routing
properties.assumption: Cloud Office DNS is the authoritative DNS for the email hosting platform

properties.data_flow: MPLS circuit handoff to Megaport exchange for customer hybrid connectivity
properties.rationale: RackConnect Global MPLS control plane integrates with Megaport for exchange connectivity
properties.assumption: MPLS and Megaport are complementary RackConnect connectivity options

properties.data_flow: MPLS circuit handoff to Equinix exchange for customer hybrid connectivity
properties.rationale: RackConnect Global MPLS control plane integrates with Equinix for exchange connectivity
properties.assumption: MPLS and Equinix are complementary RackConnect connectivity options

properties.integration_name: Physical Security Systems to DC Management Plane
properties.data_flow: PACS physical access events integrated with DCIM for datacenter security management
properties.rationale: Physical Access Control Systems (PACS) feed access events into DC Management Plane for integrated datacenter security
properties.assumption: PACS and DCIM integrated for physical security incident management

properties.integration_name: Infrastructure Automation to DC Management Plane
properties.data_flow: Automation toolbox triggers datacenter management actions via DCIM/IPMI
properties.rationale: Automation toolbox interfaces with DC Management Plane for physical infrastructure provisioning
properties.assumption: Automation toolbox has IPMI/DCIM integration for bare-metal operations

properties.integration_name: Environmental Monitoring to DC Management Plane
properties.data_flow: BMS environmental sensor data feeds into DCIM for capacity and incident management
properties.rationale: Building Management System (BMS) environmental data integrates with DC Management Plane (DCIM) for holistic datacenter management
properties.assumption: BMS and DCIM are integrated for environmental threshold alerting and capacity planning

properties.data_flow: Automation toolbox creates/updates tickets in Core Ticketing for infrastructure change tracking
properties.rationale: Infrastructure Automation Toolbox integrates with Core Ticketing System to log automated changes for audit trail
properties.assumption: Automation workflows create tickets for change management compliance

properties.integration_name: Bomgar Remote Support to Bastion Host
properties.data_flow: Bomgar remote support sessions routed through or alongside bastion host infrastructure
properties.rationale: Bomgar Remote Support Gateway complements bastion host for privileged remote access
properties.assumption: Bomgar and Bastion are parallel privileged access pathways

properties.data_flow: DDoS mitigation event alerts forwarded to Splunk for security correlation
properties.rationale: Splunk SIEM ingests DDoS mitigation events for attack correlation and reporting
properties.assumption: DDoS cluster forwards attack events to Splunk via syslog

properties.data_flow: Bastion host authenticates admin sessions via TACACS+ AAA servers
properties.rationale: Bastion host cluster uses TACACS+ for admin authentication, authorization, and accounting
properties.assumption: Standard bastion-to-AAA authentication pattern for network device access

properties.data_flow: Firewall management sessions authenticated via TACACS+
properties.rationale: Site firewall clusters use TACACS+ for management plane authentication
properties.assumption: Network device AAA is centralized via TACACS+ servers

properties.data_flow: Network monitoring polls firewall clusters for interface/traffic/security metrics
properties.rationale: Network Monitoring Cluster collects SNMP/flow data from site firewall clusters
properties.assumption: Standard SNMP-based monitoring for firewall infrastructure

properties.data_flow: Firewall allow/deny logs forwarded to Splunk for security analysis
properties.rationale: Splunk SIEM ingests site firewall logs for network threat detection
properties.assumption: Firewall clusters forward syslogs to Splunk

properties.integration_name: RAISE AI Security Engine to Splunk SIEM
properties.data_flow: AI-generated security alerts and signals fed into Splunk for correlation
properties.rationale: Rackspace AI Security Engine feeds threat signals to Splunk SIEM for enterprise security correlation
properties.assumption: RAISE integrates with Splunk as a data source or enrichment layer

properties.integration_name: RAISE AI Security Engine to CrowdStrike
properties.data_flow: RAISE consumes CrowdStrike EDR telemetry for AI-powered threat analysis
properties.rationale: Rackspace AI Security Engine ingests CrowdStrike endpoint telemetry as an input for AI-driven threat detection
properties.assumption: RAISE AI platform integrates with EDR tools for enriched threat signals

properties.integration_name: AI Business Platform to Rackspace Managed Cloud
properties.data_flow: AI platform workloads run on Rackspace Managed Cloud infrastructure
properties.rationale: Rackspace AI Business Platform is deployed on and integrates with the Rackspace Managed Cloud Platform
properties.assumption: AI platform runs as a service layer on top of RMC

properties.integration_name: FAIR MCP Accelerator to AI Business Platform
properties.data_flow: FAIR MCP Accelerator orchestrates AI capabilities via AI Business Platform
properties.rationale: FAIR MCP Enterprise Accelerator leverages Rackspace AI Business Platform for enterprise AI delivery
properties.assumption: FAIR MCP is a layer on top of the AI Business Platform

properties.data_flow: Engineering Jira issues linked to ServiceNow change/incident records
properties.rationale: Atlassian Jira integrates with ServiceNow for change management and incident correlation
properties.assumption: Jira tickets for engineering changes linked to SNOW change records

properties.data_flow: Confluence wiki pages linked to and embedded with Jira issue data
properties.rationale: Atlassian Confluence integrates natively with Jira for linked documentation and issue tracking
properties.assumption: Standard Atlassian suite integration between Confluence and Jira

properties.data_flow: IDS/IPS alerts and flow logs forwarded to Splunk
properties.rationale: Splunk SIEM ingests Palo Alto IDS/IPS alerts for threat correlation
properties.assumption: Palo Alto forwards logs/alerts to Splunk via syslog or API

properties.data_flow: CrowdStrike endpoint telemetry forwarded to Splunk
properties.rationale: Splunk SIEM ingests CrowdStrike Falcon EDR telemetry for endpoint threat correlation
properties.assumption: CrowdStrike integrates with Splunk via API or forwarder

properties.data_flow: ServiceNow ITSM events/alerts forwarded to Splunk for correlation
properties.rationale: Splunk ingests ServiceNow events for IT operations correlation and compliance reporting
properties.assumption: ServiceNow integrates with Splunk via bidirectional connector

properties.integration_name: Splunk SIEM: Trend Micro Workload Events
properties.data_flow: Trend Micro workload protection alerts forwarded to Splunk
properties.rationale: Splunk SIEM ingests Trend Micro workload security events for threat correlation
properties.assumption: Trend Micro forwards events to Splunk via syslog or API integration

properties.data_flow: CRM account/case data synced to ServiceNow for service delivery correlation
properties.rationale: Salesforce CRM syncs customer account data to ServiceNow for aligned service delivery
properties.assumption: Standard Salesforce-ServiceNow integration for customer-facing IT service management

properties.data_flow: Billing data synced to Salesforce for account revenue tracking
properties.rationale: Billing & Revenue Management System syncs invoice/revenue data to Salesforce CRM for account management and sales reporting
properties.assumption: Standard billing-to-CRM integration for revenue tracking

properties.data_flow: AD syncs identities to M365 via Azure AD Connect/Entra ID
properties.rationale: Active Directory federates with Microsoft 365 for employee email/collaboration access
properties.assumption: Standard AD-to-M365 hybrid identity with Azure AD Connect

properties.data_flow: CrowdStrike monitors AD identity events for threat detection
properties.rationale: CrowdStrike Falcon Identity Protection integrates with Active Directory to detect credential-based attacks
properties.assumption: CrowdStrike has AD sensor/integration for identity threat detection

properties.data_flow: Ticket/incident bidirectional sync between ServiceNow and Rackspace Core Ticketing
properties.rationale: ServiceNow ITSM platform syncs incidents/tickets with Rackspace Core Ticketing System
properties.assumption: SNOW is the enterprise ITSM layer; CTAPI is the Rackspace-native ticketing backend
